mapper.insert: insert into orderitems(orderId, bookId, num) values(#{order.id}, #{book.id}, #{num})
mapper.select: SELECT item.*, o.*, b.*, u.* FROM orders o INNER JOIN orderitems item ON o.id = item.orderId INNER JOIN books b ON b.id = item.bookId INNER JOIN USER u ON u.id = o.buyerId WHERE o.ordernum = #{id}
select count(1) from orderitems item INNER JOIN books b on b.id = item.bookId INNER JOIN orders o on o.id = item.orderId where b.bookname = #{name}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM orderitems WHERE orderitems.orderId IN ( SELECT id FROM orders WHERE orders.buyerId IN ( SELECT id FROM USER WHERE USER.username = #{name} ))
DELETE FROM orderitems WHERE orderitems.orderId IN ( SELECT id FROM orders WHERE orders.ordernum = #{id})
